title: IDeal Pass v2.3-n JC with Privacy Protection (SAC/EAC/Polymorphic eMRTD Configuration)
table_of_contents: TOE usage and security features for operational use
Overview of differences between the PP and the ST
Security Objectives listed in PP PACE
Additional Security Objectives from PP EAC
Security Objectives related to Polymorphic eMRTD
Security Objectives for the Operational Environment
Travel document Issuer and CSCA: travel document PKI (issuing) branch
Class FPT Protection of the Security Functions
Rationale tables of Security Objectives and SFRs
Rationale for the Security Assurance Requirements
SF.ILTB Protection against interference, logical tamperingand bypass
SF.AC Access control / Storage and protection of logical travel document data
SF.LCM Security and life cycle management

revisions.description: Initial version based on the full security target (Reference: 2017_2000032696, Version: 1.5)
Second version based on the full security target (Reference: 2017_2000032696, Version: 1.6): - JCOP 3 Platform CC certifcate updated to CC-18-98209/2. - Applet ROM masking added.
